name: Parisian Nights
overview: You start the game stark naked in a red, Parisian bedroom and believe it or not, things are going to get wilder from here. Parisian Nights is set between the two world wars. As Monsieur Phillip Groucy, a French Secret Service Agent, you awake in a seedy suburb of Paris with no money. You must recover your stolen credit card and maintain the health of your body and soul.
